text:
When admin configure server.xml file its write this parans trustStoreType
trustStorePass trustStoreFile in the conector tag, but te service don't work.

If i change to truststoreType truststorePass truststoreFile its work well. 

See: 

    <Connector
        port="8445"
        scheme="https"
        secure="true"
        keystoreFile="C:\ssl\certs\localhost.pfx"
        keystorePass="1234"
        trustStoreFile="C:\ssl\certs\ca.pfx"
        sslProtocol="TLS"
        maxSpareThreads="75"
        trustStorePass="1234"
        maxThreads="150"
        keystoreType="PKCS12"
        trustStoreType="PKCS12"
        minSpareThreads="25"
        clientAuth="true">
    </Connector>


    <Connector
        port="8443"
        scheme="https"
        secure="true"
        keystoreFile="C:\ssl\certs\localhost.pfx"
        keystorePass="1234"
        truststoreFile="C:\ssl\certs\ca.pfx"
        sslProtocol="TLS"
        maxSpareThreads="75"
        truststorePass="1234"
        maxThreads="150"
        keystoreType="PKCS12"
        truststoreType="PKCS12"
        minSpareThreads="25"
        clientAuth="true">
    </Connector>
creator: mtheus@gmail.com
chris@sourcelabs.com
text:
Created attachment 19954
Patch to fix parameter name mismatch in Admin webapp

creator: chris@sourcelabs.com
text:
Created attachment 19955
Patch to fix parameter name mismatch in Admin webapp

This patch plus the one for EditConnectorAction.java should remediate the
parameter name mismatch issue in the Admin webapp.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Your patch has been applied to svn and will be included in 5.5.24 onwards.

Many thanks.
